document.full_text: the obama administration should adopt a trusted traveler program and order airlines to permit travelers to check one bag for free to make airport screening faster and encourage more travel, a leading industry group said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. travel group urges overhaul to aviation screening
lines_and_colors: the obama administration should adopt a trusted traveler program and order airlines to permit travelers to check one bag for free to make airport screening faster and encourage more travel, a leading industry group said on wednesday.
